about_the_game:
Mechstorm


Join our community on Discord


Save Humanity from the AI Army
Prepare for the ultimate battle for humanity's survival! Mechstorm is an adrenaline-fueled vehicle combat game that pushes vehicle combat to the limit. A robotic army has driven humanity underground. Join the resistance! Reclaim the planet! Restore hope!

Immerse yourself in a post-apocalyptic world, where your decisions can mean victory or defeat. Customize your vehicle, armed to the teeth with powerful weapons. From futuristic cars to jet craft to hardened tanks, choose from an array of vehicles, each with its own strengths and capabilities.



Multiplayer Co-Op
Go on a solo mission or team up with a friend via voice chat and unleash devastating combos that will increase your odds of winning. Coordination and communication are the keys to success as you strategize to outsmart AI mechs, tanks, drones, and more.



Fight For Survival Against the AI Robot Army

These robots are cunning and swift, possessing lightning-fast reflexes and lethal precision. Whether armed with laser cannons, plasma rifles, or devastating melee weapons, they'll stop at nothing to exterminate you and the resistance. Expect relentless, coordinating attacks that adapt to your strategies and exploit your weaknesses.

Strategy
Working alone or with a team member, strategy is crucial to success. Hide in the shadows, plan coordinated attacks, and strategically place explosives. Some enemies are so powerful that your best option is to outrun them at high speed.

Custom Soundtrack and Sound Effects
We partner with electronic musicians to create a high-energy soundtrack to propel you through each level. Each level has a style and music to match.

Customization
Customize your combat vehicle to suit your playstyle. Upgrade weapons, armor, and special abilities to create the ultimate war machine. Experiment with different performance packages, fine-tune your load-outs, and adapt your strategies to overcome an ever-evolving enemy.

"Mechstorm" is an immersive simulation that will transport you to a world where the fate of humanity hangs in the balance. With stunning visuals, pulse-pounding sound effects, and intuitive controls, you'll find yourself fully immersed in the chaos and intensity of battle.

Coming to PC, Steamdeck, and Mac
Rally your friends and prepare for the fight of your lives. The future of the human race is in your hands. Answer the call and become the hero that humanity deserves.

Voice Chat
Stay in contact with your partner using voice chat, playing from anywhere in the world as you plot to defeat your enemies.



When? How? I Want to Race!
Mechstorm is currently in closed beta. If you are interested in playing reach out to us on our studio website or on our Twitter page.

content_descriptors.notes: Vehicle combat game where vehicles fight an AI army.
